body:
Hey guys I just want to inform you that the top 5 nebula plays will be on Sunday 11/something/14. I've gotten 4 clips and there pretty dang good so if you want to fill that 5th spot or r even take someone else's spot. Send me the video of your play and I will gladly watch and see if it's good enough to be in the Top 5 Plays of the week.
Best of luck you have 1 1/2 days to send me the clips.
~BioNicBhawk
email- BioNicBhawk11@gmail.com
thats where the video should be send to by Sunday!

title: SUNDAY! (Top 5 Plays of the week on nebula)
